::Prowl/Striker/Ramulus/Ramhorn/Smokescreen::

Prowl rolls out of the way of most of Ares' shots, ending up behind a 
boulder, near Ramhorn. He motions for Ramhorn to give him a charge, which the 
fellow Maximal does. Prowl jumps out from behind the boulder, throwing the 
charge at Ares.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Smokescreen ducks, the shots going over his head. He brings his fist up as 
Serpentor's jump brings him closer, punching at Serpentor's chest.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus rolls to the left, a shot hitting his leg. The ram aims his gun, 
firing at Shuko.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker bring his arm up, Hades' claws and teeth hitting it. With his other 
hand, the Maximal stabs his sword at Hades' chest.
